reviewText: I bought this as a gag gift when I found out my girlfriends step father was "Richard Simmons". Not the exercise guy in the video, but who could resist bringing this along to meet him for the first time. The item arrived on time and as promised. Another great purchase.
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies

reviewText: I had this in VHS format and was always one of my favorite videos.  I am really glad to have found it in a DVD
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies

reviewText: Product was received very fast and in perfect condition. it came with toning straps and the moves are very easy to follow. Just what the doctor ordered to get the weight down and muscles toned!! And it's FUN!!
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies

reviewText: If you love working out to good music and you love working out with Richard Simmons than you need to get this workout. It is so much fun and you will love it.
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies

reviewText: Who doesn't love working out with Richard Simmons? This was an investment in my health and I'm very pleased with it. The price was great and the condition was fine. A good purchase
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies

reviewText: these dvd's will work you right and you don't need a gym or gym equipment--priced nice and fun music to dance to--i own this and would be without it-you'll love it to as will those you give it to
Title: Tonin' to the Oldies
